ramp-mcp.name: Ramp MCP
ramp-mcp.description: A Model Context Protocol server for retrieving and analyzing data or running tasks for [Ramp](https://ramp.com) using [Developer API](https://docs.ramp.com/developer-api/v1/overview/introduction). In order to get around token and input size limitations, this server implements a simple ETL pipeline + ephemeral sqlite database in memory for analysis by an LLM. All requests are made to demo by default, but can be changed by setting `RAMP_ENV=prd`. Large datasets may not be processable due to API and/or your MCP client limitations.
